htmlContent: Taiwan shall be treated as a Battleground country for scoring purposes, if the US controls Taiwan when the Asia Scoring Card is played or during Final Scoring at the end of Turn 10. Taiwan is not a Battleground country for any other game purpose. This card is discarded after US play of The China Card.
name: Formosan Resolution*
plainContent: Taiwan shall be treated as a Battleground country for scoring purposes, if the US controls Taiwan when the Asia Scoring Card is played or during Final Scoring at the end of Turn 10. Taiwan is not a Battleground country for any other game purpose. This card is discarded after US play of The China Card.
